group_1.textRight: Ria, you’re amazing!
I heard they picked you to be the representative...
...for the Chocolate Forest Walnut faction!

group_1.textLeft: *Chuckle* Why, thank you.
Well, given my skill and fame,
Yachiyo Nanami stands no chance against me!

group_1.textRight: You sure are full of yourself for someone playing @second fiddle to Sayuki.

group_1.textLeft: [chara:301001:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Grr... You can't hold your tongue for even@one second, can you?!
Still, Sayuki is an idol...and I'm a fashion model.
Given the difference, the two of us are hardly comparable!

group_1.textRight: But do you think pitting two BiBi models against @each other is a good idea?
Yachiyo has accomplished a lot more than you.
You're pretty obscure, so it feels like they're trying...
...to make up for the gulf between you two by@really hyping you up.

group_1.textLeft: ...You're so right that I can't even think of a proper @retort.
But even so!
I vow that by the time this campaign is over, I’ll no @longer merely be “an up-and-coming rookie!”

group_1.textRight: ...Yeah! That's the spirit, Ria!
If you don't mind...do you think I could help?

group_1.textLeft: But of course! Welcome aboard!
...I see.
So you came to my shop to promote Team Walnut, @right?

group_1.textRight: Correct.

group_1.textCenter: We’ll be doing a lot of promotional campaigns,
but you're more than welcome to talk about it with @your friends.
Of course, you can't bribe them into voting for us!

group_1.textRight: ...That's the long and short of it!
You think you know anyone who'd be willing @to help us out?

group_1.textLeft: Have you spoken with the other girls at school?

group_1.textRight: Of course we have!
But we’ll need help with spreading the word beyond @Mizuna.
You see, there are separate polls going on in each @district, and it’s a winner-take-all sort of thing.

group_1.textLeft: Ah...and, of course, girls from all across Kamihama @gather here.

group_1.textRight: Precisely!
By the way, Mitama, which side are you on?

group_1.textLeft: I'm neutral, of course!

group_1.textRight: A smart businessman makes no enemies, eh?

group_1.textLeft: My, if it isn't Yukika! Welcome! ♪

group_1.textRight: Oh, Ami-senpai…? @What is everyone doing here?

group_1.textLeft: This is our chance!
Right. While she's from Mizuna, too, we should still @recruit her.

group_1.textRight: Um...what are you talking about?

group_1.textLeft: In short, we were wondering...
If you might be willing to lend your support @to Team Walnut...

group_1.textRight: ...Oh, if that’s what this is about, I must decline.

group_1.textLeft: Excellent! Just as I had hoped!
[chara:301001:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...Wait, what did you just say?! You’re not…?

group_1.textRight: [chara:301701:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]That’s right! I'm on Team Acorn!

group_1.textLeft: You turned us down without skipping a beat...
...You seem kind of different than normal, Nanase.
...Yes. Not in your nature, but in your conviction.
You can see a whole different side of girls when @candy is at hand!
Oh, another visitor?

group_1.textRight: Hello!

group_1.textLeft: It's Kanoko!
Well met, Yayoi. There’s something I’d like to speak @with you about...

group_1.textRight: ...I’m afraid I can’t.
I’m not really into acorns or walnuts.
[chara:300101:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Instead, I’m all about chocolate mushrooms! @That’s the one thing I can’t back down on!

group_1.textLeft: [chara:301001:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Is there a secret faction...?!
Yeah...of course you would be, Kanoko...
I'm starting to think promoting Team Walnut...
Is going to be much harder than any of us could @have imagined...
